text: @realDonaldTrump So, the Coronavirus started in China, while Trump cut CDC funding and dismantled the pandemic response team.  Trump's HHS sent a team without proper infectious disease training to greet our citizens returning from China, and sent them out into the country without being screened.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
